name: Great Bubble Shooter
description:
Great, amazing and addictive bubble shooting free game! This is a classic bubble shoot match three game. Shoot bubbles to match colors a try to make the biggest score. The Great Bubble Shooter is a great fun! Try this very exciting and challenging game!

How to play:
Tap screen to aim! Stop touching screen to shoot the bubble. Create groups of 3 or more of the same color bubbles to destroy them.

Features:
- HD high quality graphics
- beautiful animations
- great gameplay
- user friendly interface

Have fun!
